title: Circuits and Electronics
subtitle: Learn electronic circuit techniques and applications in designing microchips for smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the Internet.

courses.title: Circuits and Electronics 1: Basic Circuit Analysis

course_runs.title: Circuits and Electronics 1: Basic Circuit Analysis
course_runs.short_description: Learn techniques that are foundational to the design of microchips used in smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the Internet.

courses.short_description: Learn techniques that are foundational to the design of microchips used in smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the Internet.

courses.title: Circuits and Electronics 2: Amplification, Speed, and Delay

course_runs.title: Circuits and Electronics 2: Amplification, Speed, and Delay
course_runs.short_description: Learn how to speed up digital circuits and build amplifiers in the design of microchips used in smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the Internet.

courses.short_description: Learn how to speed up digital circuits and build amplifiers in the design of microchips used in smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the Internet.

courses.title: Circuits and Electronics 3: Applications

course_runs.title: Circuits and Electronics 3: Applications
course_runs.short_description: Learn about cool applications, op-amps and filters in the design of microchips used in smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the internet.

courses.short_description: Learn about cool applications, op-amps and filters in the design of microchips used in smartphones, self-driving cars, computers, and the internet.

marketing_hook: Learn about electronic circuit techniques and applications

title: Accounting

title: Water Management
subtitle: Explore water management concepts and technologies.

courses.title: Introduction to Water and Climate

course_runs.title: Introduction to Water and Climate
course_runs.short_description: The basic elements of and the relation between water and climate are highlighted and further discussed together with their mutual coherence.

course_runs.short_description: Explore how climate change, water availability, and engineering innovation are key challenges for our planet.
